attributes.action: Add a "None of the Above" section to the ballot form for elections.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Owing to the low standard of party candidates and there being little or no difference between the main political parties, many voters do not vote, a None of the Above section allows them to use their vote to register their disgust at the farcial process.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
